description:
If you are new to small business accounting or need a refresher, this course is for you. From terminology to reading reports, small business accounting can sometimes be confusing. During this 3 hour Accounting video training course, our expert instructor will teach you about different types of accounts (asset, liability, equity, income and expense), payroll, financial statements and much more.

This accounting tutorial covers the same material as our classroom training and was designed to provide a solid foundation in accounting. We have incorporated years of classroom training experience and teaching techniques to develop an easy-to-use course that you can customize to meet your personal learning needs. Simply launch a video lesson or open one of the manuals and youâ€™re on your way to mastering accounting.
title: Small Business and Managerial Accounting Training Tutorial
